00030 /* wrapper for the error condition related to the database */
00031 #define DB_ERROR(cond, message, db) \
00032         if(cond) { \
00033                 fprintf(stderr, "%s: %s\n", message, sqlite3_errmsg(db)); \
00034                 return -1; \
00035         }
00036 
00037 /* wrapper for the error messages that we get from the data base */
00038 #define DB_PRINTERR(message,db) \
00039         fprintf(stderr, "%s: %s\n",message, sqlite3_errmsg(db));

00041 DbBackend::DbBackend(const char *path)
00042 {
00043         db_path.assign(path);
00044         db = NULL;
00045 
00046         /* init virtual query caches */
00047 }

00051         db_close_storage();

00057 void DbBackend::db_close_storage()
00058 {
00059         int ret;
00060         
00061         DBG_SHOWFC();
00062 
00063         /* close all databases here */
00064         if (!db)
00065                 return;
00066 
00067         ret = sqlite3_close(db);
00068         if(ret != SQLITE_OK)
00069                 DB_PRINTERR("Error at closing the database: ",db);
00070         db = NULL;
00071 }
00072 
00073 int DbBackend::run_simple_query(const char* query)
00074 {
00075         int ret;
00076         sqlite3_stmt *select= NULL;
00077 
00078         ret = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, query, -1, &select, 0);
00079         if (ret != SQLITE_OK || !select) {
00080                 DB_PRINTERR("Preparing select: ",db);
00081                 goto error;
00082         }
00083         ret = sqlite3_step(select);
00084         if (ret != SQLITE_DONE) {
00085                 DB_PRINTERR("Running select: ",db);
00086                 goto error;
00087         }
00088 
00089         ret = sqlite3_finalize(select);
00090 
00091         return ret;
00092 
00093 error: if (select)
00094                 sqlite3_finalize(select);
00095         return 1;
00096 }
00097 
00098 int DbBackend::create_main_tables()
00099 {
00100         int ret, empty, exit;
00101         sqlite3_stmt *select= NULL;
00102 
00103         /* check if we already have the tables */
00104         ret = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, "SELECT name FROM sqlite_master "
00105                 "WHERE tbl_name LIKE 'tags' AND type  == 'table'; ", -1,
00106                         &select, 0);
00107         if (ret!=SQLITE_OK || !select) {
00108                 DB_PRINTERR("Preparing select: ",db);
00109                 sqlite3_finalize(select);
00110                 return -1;
00111         }
00112         empty = 0;
00113         exit = 0;
00114         ret = sqlite3_step(select);
00115         switch(ret) {
00116         case SQLITE_DONE:
00117                 empty = 1;
00118                 exit = 0;
00119                 break;
00120         case SQLITE_ROW:
00121                 empty = 0;
00122                 exit = 0;
00123                 break;
00124         default:
00125                 DB_PRINTERR("Database error: ",db);
00126                 exit = 1;
00127                 break;
00128         }
00129         /* need to exit due to an error? */
00130         if (exit) {
00131                 sqlite3_finalize(select);
00132                 return -1;
00133         }
00134         ret  = sqlite3_finalize(select);
00135         if(ret != SQLITE_OK) {
00136                 DB_PRINTERR("Database error: ",db);
00137                 return -1;
00138         }
00139         /* we have an empy database, create the tables */
00140         if (empty) {
00141                 DBG_PRINT("HYBFS: Creating main table \n");
00142 
00143                 ret = run_simple_query("CREATE TABLE tags("
00144                         "tag_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, \n"
00145                         "tag VARCHAR(256), \n"
00146                         "value VARCHAR(256),"
00147                         "UNIQUE (tag, value));");
00148                 DB_ERROR(ret != SQLITE_OK,"Table TAGS ", db);
00149 
00150                 ret = run_simple_query("CREATE TABLE files("
00151                         "ino INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, \n"
00152                         "mode INTEGER, \n"
00153                         "path VARCHAR(256)) ;");
00154                 DB_ERROR(ret != SQLITE_OK,"Table FILES ", db);
00155 
00156                 ret = run_simple_query("CREATE TABLE assoc("
00157                         "ino INTEGER, \n"
00158                         "tag_id INTEGER, \n"
00159                         "PRIMARY KEY (ino, tag_id) \n );");
00160                 DB_ERROR(ret != SQLITE_OK,"Table ASSOC ", db);
00161 
00162         }
00163 
00164         return 0;
00165 }
00166 
00167 int DbBackend::db_init_storage()
00168 {
00169         int ret = 0;
00170 
00171         DBG_SHOWFC();
00172 
00173         /* open the database for the given branch */
00174         DBG_PRINT("env path is: %s \n", db_path.c_str());
00175 
00176         ret = sqlite3_open(db_path.c_str(), &db);
00177         if (ret) {
00178                 DB_PRINTERR("Can't open database", db);
00179                 sqlite3_close(db);
00180                 return ret;
00181         }
00182 
00183         ret = create_main_tables();
00184         if (ret) {
00185                 db_close_storage();
00186                 return 1;
00187         }
00188 
00189         return 0;
00190 }
00191 
00192 int DbBackend::db_add_tag(const char *tag, const char *value)
00193 {
00194         int ret = -1;
00195         sqlite3_stmt *select= NULL;
00196 
00197         DBG_SHOWFC();
00198 
00199         sqlite3_exec(db, "BEGIN", 0, 0, 0);
00200         /* adds the info in all the tables */
00201         ret = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, "INSERT INTO tags (tag, value) VALUES (?1, ?2);",
00202                         -1, &select, 0);
00203 
00204         if (ret != SQLITE_OK || !select) {
00205                 DB_PRINTERR("Preparing insert: ",db);
00206                 goto error;
00207         }
00208 
00209         sqlite3_bind_text(select, 1, tag, -1, SQLITE_STATIC);
00210         if(value != NULL)
00211                 sqlite3_bind_text(select, 2, value, -1, SQLITE_STATIC);
00212         else
00213                 sqlite3_bind_text(select, 2, NULL_VALUE, -1, SQLITE_STATIC);
00214         
00215         ret = sqlite3_step(select);
00216         if(ret != SQLITE_DONE) {
00217                 DB_PRINTERR("Executing insert: ",db);
00218                 goto error;
00219         }
00220         
00221         ret = sqlite3_finalize(select);
00222         select = NULL;
00223         
00224         /* get the tag number, so we can use it for the other insertions */
00225         if(ret != SQLITE_OK){
00226                 DB_PRINTERR("Error at processing tag insert: ",db);
00227                 goto error;
00228         }
00229         sqlite3_exec(db, "COMMIT", 0, 0, 0);
00230         
00231         return db_check_tag(tag, value);
00232         
00233 error:
00234         if(select)
00235                 sqlite3_finalize(select);
00236         sqlite3_exec(db, "ROLLBACK", 0, 0, 0);
00237         
00238         return -1;
00239 }

00241 int DbBackend::db_add_file(file_info_t * finfo)
00242 {
00243         int ret;
00244         sqlite3_stmt *select= NULL;
00245         
00246         DBG_SHOWFC();
00247         
00248         /* adds the info in all the tables */
00249         ret = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, "INSERT INTO files VALUES (?1, ?2, ?3);",
00250                         -1, &select, 0);
00251 
00252         if (ret != SQLITE_OK || !select) {
00253                 DB_PRINTERR("Preparing insert: ",db);
00254                 goto error;
00255         }
00256 
00257         sqlite3_bind_int64(select, 1, finfo->fid);
00258         sqlite3_bind_int(select, 2, finfo->mode);
00259         sqlite3_bind_text(select, 3, &finfo->name[0], finfo->namelen, SQLITE_STATIC);
00260         sqlite3_step(select);
00261 
00262         ret = sqlite3_finalize(select);
00263         select = NULL;
00264 
00265         /* get the tag number, so we can use it for the other insertions */
00266         if (ret != SQLITE_OK) {
00267                 DB_PRINTERR("Error at processing tag insert: ",db);
00268                 goto error;
00269         }
00270         
00271 error:
00272         if(select)
00273                 sqlite3_finalize(select);
00274         return -1;
00275 }

00277 int DbBackend::db_add_file_info(vector<string> *tags, file_info_t * finfo)
00278 {
00279         int ret = 0;
00280         int tag_id;
00281         size_t fpos;
00282         sqlite3_stmt *select= NULL;
00283         string tag_value;
00284         string tag, value;
00285         
00286         DBG_SHOWFC();
00287 
00288         /* now adds the file info */
00289         ret = db_add_file(finfo);
00290         /* TODO should I delete the tag from the DB? */
00291         /*if (ret) {
00292                 commits = "ROLLBACK";
00293                 goto error;
00294         }*/
00295 
00296         /* now the association */
00297         ret = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, "INSERT INTO assoc VALUES (?1, ?2);", -1,
00298                         &select, 0);
00299 
00300         if (ret != SQLITE_OK || !select) {
00301                 DB_PRINTERR("Preparing insert: ",db);
00302                 goto error;
00303         }
00304 
00305         for (vector<string>::iterator tok_iter = tags->begin(); tok_iter
00306                         != tags->end(); ++tok_iter) {
00307 
00308                 /* break the tag in (tag-value) */
00309                 fpos = (*tok_iter).find(":");
00310                 if(fpos != string::npos) {
00311                         tag = (*tok_iter).substr(0, fpos);
00312                         value = (*tok_iter).substr(fpos+1, (*tok_iter).length() - 1);
00313                         tag_id = db_add_tag(tag.c_str(), value.c_str());
00314                 }
00315                 else
00316                         tag_id = db_add_tag((*tok_iter).c_str(), NULL);
00317 
00318                 /* adds the tag info */
00319                 if (tag_id <= 0) {
00320                         goto error;
00321                 }
00322 
00323                 sqlite3_bind_int(select, 1, finfo->fid);
00324                 sqlite3_bind_int(select, 2, tag_id);
00325                 ret = sqlite3_step(select);
00326                 if (ret != SQLITE_DONE) {
00327                         DB_PRINTERR("Error at trying to insert a tag: ",db);
00328                         goto error;
00329                 }
00330                 sqlite3_reset(select);
00331         }
00332         ret = sqlite3_finalize(select);
00333 
00334         select = NULL;
00335 
00336         return 0;
00337 error: 
00338         if (select)
00339                 sqlite3_finalize(select);
00340         
00341         return -1;
00342 }

00369 int DbBackend::db_check_tag(const char *tag, const char *value)
00370 {
00371         int res = 0;
00372         int tag_id;
00373         sqlite3_stmt *select= NULL;
00374 
00375         DBG_SHOWFC();
00376 
00377         DBG_PRINT("I check tag %s : %s \n", tag, value);
00378         /* search for the tag id in the table */
00379         
00380         res = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, "SELECT tag_id FROM tags WHERE  "
00381                         "tag == ?1 AND value == ?2 ;", -1, &select, 0);
00382 
00383         if (res != SQLITE_OK || !select) {
00384                 DB_PRINTERR("Preparing select: ",db);
00385                 goto error;
00386         }
00387 
00388         sqlite3_bind_text(select, 1, tag, -1, SQLITE_STATIC);
00389         if (value == NULL)
00390                 sqlite3_bind_text(select, 2, NULL_VALUE, -1, SQLITE_STATIC);
00391         else
00392                 sqlite3_bind_text(select, 2, value, -1, SQLITE_STATIC);
00393 
00394         res = sqlite3_step(select);
00395         switch (res)
00396         {
00397         case SQLITE_DONE:
00398                 tag_id = 0;
00399                 break;
00400         case SQLITE_ROW:
00401                 tag_id = sqlite3_column_int(select, 0);
00402                 break;
00403         default:
00404                 tag_id = -1;
00405                 DB_PRINTERR("Getting tag id: ",db)
00406                 ;
00407         }
00408         if (tag_id < 0)
00409                 goto error;
00410 
00411         res = sqlite3_finalize(select);
00412         if (res != SQLITE_OK)
00413                 DB_PRINTERR("Error at trying to insert a tag: ",db);
00414 
00415         DBG_PRINT("Getting tag id: %d \n",tag_id);
00416 
00417         return (res != SQLITE_OK) ? -1 : tag_id;
00418 
00419 error: 
00420         if (select)
00421                 sqlite3_finalize(select);
00422         
00423         return -1;
00424 }

00427 static int tags_callback(void *data, int argc, char **argv, char **colname)
00428 {
00429         ostringstream component;
00430         list<string> *tags = (list<string> *) data;
00431         
00432         if(argc <1)
00433                 return 0;
00434         
00435         if(argv[0] == NULL)
00436                 return 0;
00437         
00438         if(strlen(argv[0]) == 0)
00439                 return 0;
00440         
00441         component << '(' << argv[0] << ')';
00442         tags->push_back(component.str());
00443         
00444         return 0;
00445 }
00446 
00447 list<string> * DbBackend::db_get_tags()
00448 {
00449         int res = 0;
00450         char * err;
00451         list<string> *tags = new list<string>;
00452         if(tags == NULL)
00453                 return NULL;
00454 
00455         DBG_SHOWFC();
00456         
00457         res = sqlite3_exec(db, "SELECT DISTINCT tag FROM tags ;", tags_callback, tags, &err);
00458         if( res !=SQLITE_OK ){
00459             PRINT_ERROR("SQL error: %s\n", err);
00460             sqlite3_free(err);
00461             
00462             tags->clear();
00463             delete tags;
00464             
00465             return NULL;
00466           }
00467         
00468         return tags;
00469 }
00470 
00471 static int tags_values_callback(void *data, int argc, char **argv, char **colname)
00472 {
00473         ostringstream component;
00474         list<string> *tags = (list<string> *) data;
00475         
00476         assert(tags);
00477         assert(argv);
00478         assert(colname);
00479         
00480         if(argc <2)
00481                 return 0;
00482         
00483         if(argv[0] == NULL || argv[1] == NULL)
00484                 return 0;
00485         
00486         if(strlen(argv[0]) == 0 || strlen(argv[1]) == 0 || strcmp(argv[1], NULL_VALUE) == 0)
00487                 return 0;
00488         
00489         component << '(' << argv[0] << ':' << argv[1] << ')';
00490         
00491         tags->push_back(component.str());
00492         
00493         return 0;
00494 }

00496 list<string> * DbBackend::db_get_tags_values()
00497 {
00498         int res = 0;
00499         char * err;
00500         list<string> *tags = new list<string>;
00501         if (tags == NULL)
00502                 return NULL;
00503 
00504         DBG_SHOWFC();
00505 
00506         res = sqlite3_exec(db, "SELECT tag, value FROM tags ;", tags_values_callback,
00507                         tags, &err);
00508         if (res !=SQLITE_OK) {
00509                 PRINT_ERROR("SQL error: %s\n", err);
00510                 sqlite3_free(err);
00511 
00512                 tags->clear();
00513                 delete tags;
00514 
00515                 return NULL;
00516         }
00517 
00518         return tags;
00519 }

00521 int DbBackend::db_get_filesinfo(list<string> *tags, string *path,
00522                                 void * buf, filler_t filler)
00523 {
00524         /* get all files only for a tag:value pair, possibly with the specified path..*/
00525         /* TODO: do it for multiple tags */
00526         string tag, value;
00527         
00528         break_tag(&(tags->front()), &tag, &value);
00529         DBG_PRINT("I have tag #%s# value #%s# \n", tag.c_str(), value.c_str());
00530         
00531         return db_get_files(path->c_str(), tag.c_str(), value.c_str(), buf, filler);
00532 }
00533 
00534 int DbBackend::db_get_files(const char * path, const char * tag, 
00535                             const char *value, void * buf, filler_t filler)
00536 {
00537         sqlite3_stmt* sql;
00538         int res, fill;
00539         ostringstream sql_string;
00540         /* build the query */
00541         sql_string << "SELECT files.ino, mode, path FROM files, tags, assoc WHERE ";
00542         if(path[0] != '\0') {
00543                 DBG_PRINT(" path is not zero!\n");
00544                 sql_string<< " path LIKE " << path << "% AND ";
00545         }
00546         sql_string << "tags.tag = ?1 AND ";
00547         if(value[0]!='\0')
00548                 sql_string << "tags.value = ?2 AND ";
00549         sql_string << "tags.tag_id = assoc.tag_id AND files.ino = assoc.ino ;";
00550         
00551         /* done building the query */
00552         res = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, sql_string.str().c_str(), -1, &sql, 0);
00553         if (res != SQLITE_OK || !sql) {
00554                 DB_PRINTERR("Preparing select: ",db);
00555                 goto error;
00556         }
00557 
00558         sqlite3_bind_text(sql, 1, tag, -1, SQLITE_STATIC);
00559         if (value[0] != '\0') {
00560                 sqlite3_bind_text(sql, 2, value, -1, SQLITE_STATIC);
00561                 DBG_PRINT("value for tag is not zero!\n");
00562         }
00563         
00564         while ((res = sqlite3_step(sql)) == SQLITE_ROW) {
00565                 stat_t st;
00566                 memset(&st, 0, sizeof(stat_t));
00567                 st.st_ino = sqlite3_column_int64(sql, 0);
00568                 st.st_mode = sqlite3_column_int(sql, 1);
00569                 char *abspath = (char *)sqlite3_column_text(sql, 2);
00570                 if(abspath == NULL) {
00571                         res = -1;
00572                         break;
00573                 }
00574 
00575                 fill = filler(buf, abspath, &st, 0);
00576                 if(fill) {
00577                         res = SQLITE_DONE;
00578                         break;
00579                 }
00580         }
00581 
00582         if (res != SQLITE_DONE) {
00583                 DB_PRINTERR("Error at processing select: ",db);
00584                 goto error;
00585         }
00586         res = sqlite3_finalize(sql);
00587         if (res != SQLITE_OK) {
00588                 sql = NULL;
00589                 DB_PRINTERR("Error at finalizing select: ",db);
00590                 goto error;
00591         }
00592 
00593         return 0;
00594 
00595 error: 
00596         if (sql)
00597                 sqlite3_finalize(sql);
00598 
00599         return -1;
00600 }
